document_data.name: Dilgar Sneese
document_data.mainbody:
'''Dilgar Sneese''' was a worshiper of [[Umberlee]] who prayed at the [[Water Queen's House]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''I'm trying to get my prayers straightâ€”don't want to piss off the Bitch Queen.''|Dilgar Sneese}}
document_data.Description: Dilgar was a light-skinned [[rock gnome]] woman with light brown hair and dark brown eyes. She wore a simple cloth jerkin and a blue tunic.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Dilgar Sneese frequented the Water Queen's House, uttering prayers to her goddess. She was fearful of messing up the prayers and sought to come in for a single devotion and promptly leave.
